about_me: Results-driven Frontend Developer with experience building modern, responsive web applications. Skilled in React, Vue, JavaScript, and TypeScript, with strong expertise in HTML, CSS, and SASS. Experienced in RESTful API integration and collaborating effectively with backend developers and UI/UX designers to deliver high-quality solutions. Experienced in working with international clients. Skilled in translating Figma designs into functional, maintainable interfaces. Delivers stable, user-focused solutions and continuously expands expertise with emerging tools and frameworks. Additionaly familiar with Laravel, PHP, and Node.js, with basic backend development skills.
AngularTS_training_description: Two-day training in Angular and TypeScript covering both theory and practice. Gained experience in team-based project development by creating an application for company integration management.
